caption.title: Overview of dispersal patterns of nonsynonymous mutations within sequences from Cluster 1.
caption.p: Subsections of the graph from Fig 1 showing higher resolution of mutation patterns. Cluster 1 is defined by NS5 mutation Thr/Met114Val ( Fig 4E) first detected in 2014 (marked by a star). Fragments of clusters 1.1â€“1.4 with genomes listed in the y axis are selected to show the locations of sequences from microcephaly cases.
